Industry experience of 3-4 years in developing scalable software.Requirements :- 3+ years of experience as a Fullstack developer Must have: Python, Django In frontend.- Experience in VueJS is preferred but ReactJS & Angular4 will also do- Excellent knowledge of Python with more than 2yrs experience in backend web development with Django- Strong knowledge of JavaScript with experience in any frontend framework (Preferably React)- Experience in prototyping, designing, architecting and implementing Saas systems.- Excellent command over Data Structures and Algorithms with experience in software engineering and product delivery- Good understanding of databases and SQL with an ability to create ETL pipelines using structured queries.- Familiarity with framework tools: REST services, java server performance expertise.- Experience with web technologies like Linux, Apache, Kafka, Memcache, Redis- Familiarity with AWS products - EC2, SNS, SQS, S3, Beanstalk etc.- Good communication and peer networking skills.- Strong problem solving and analytical skillsKey Responsibilities :- Build new features into the application and own their further development- Suggest new features for the product- Build tools to streamline the development processes.- Suggest new tools to automate process flows
